description: The Jack Rose is a wonderfully complex and flavorful cocktail with a unique combination of sweetness, acidity, and tartness that makes it very refreshing. It is also very easy to make, a great way to show off your bartending skills to your friends and family.
name: Jack Rose

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the applejack, grenadine, bitters, and lemon juice into a shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the applejack, grenadine, bitters, and lemon juice into a shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Add ice and shake the mixture vigorously for 15 seconds or until chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Add ice and shake the mixture vigorously for 15 seconds or until chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain the mixture into a glass and squeeze the lemon twist onto the cocktail’s surface.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain the mixture into a glass and squeeze the lemon twist onto the cocktail’s surface.

recipeInstructions.name: Rim the glass with the lemon twist before serving.
recipeInstructions.text: Rim the glass with the lemon twist before serving.
